alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 3:44AM EST until March 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN SUNDAY... .Precipitation is expected to overspread the area Sunday morning and gradually increase in coverage and intensity through the day. Temperatures will stubbornly remain below freezing across the interior portions of western Maine and freezing rain is likely. While amounts will not be heavy, they may lead to icy road conditions during the first half of the day before temperatures climb above freezing. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch, sleet accumulations of between 1/10 and 2/10 of an inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...Northern Franklin, Central Somerset and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
